item.title: Image Manipulation in Firebase
item.description: We can manipulate images using JavaScript directly, which can be run both on the server or browser environment. Lets take a look at how we’d do this using create-react-app and firebase. We will deploy a function on firebase that will download the user’s avatar, manipulate the image and overlay it with a mask, and then spit out an image. Project Setup First make sure that you have nvm installed. We’ll need a different version of node for create-react-app then we will for firebase functions.
